about.text:
This is my website showcasing projects I have designed, developed, or contributed to over the years. Whether it's an Android app, a full-stack website, or a set of low-level memory management functions in assembly, each project represents a step in my growth as a developer. I enjoy working on all levels accross the stack, and I'm always exploring new languages, paradigms, and problem solving techniques. From low-level systems to high level designs, I enjoy building solutions from the ground up.

Feel free to explore my work and reach out if you'd like to connect!

Thanks for visiting!

portfolio.name: Noise Nest
portfolio.desc: A soundboard for linux enabling users to bind custom hotkeys to play sound files through a microphone output. Saves users created configurations using TinyXML and loads them at the application start.
